articles.title: NASA admits it may be time to study sex in space ahead of Mars missions - Daily Mail
articles.description: Understanding sex, and how it will work in a low gravity environment, is essential, according to the academics from Concordia University in Montreal, Canada.
articles.content:
NASA says it is considering studying sex in space, as it is 'crucial' for future long-haul missions to the Moon and Mars, that could see astronauts away from Earth for years.
